modName: Change Females Npcs In Vanilla Their Hairs
summary: Hi, i am quite new to this. This mod give Vanilla Npcs New Hairstyle.
descriptionHtml:
Hello,

This mod change the hairstyle look of vanilla female npcs in game. Currently there are over 50 female npcs in game that change their hairstyle.

I also give housecarls inventories and spells change, they are deadly and use dragon shouts. And they are essential.

Note:

1. The pictures allow you to look at the hairstyle changes.
2. You should be able to use any body, face, eyes, brows, character tints package found here. They should be able to give you better or new looks ingame based on the textures mod you choose.

Just be sure you have a body mod in Meshes\\Actors\\Character\\Character Assets - which consist of female body, feet and hand.nif , there should be about six files.

And textures for body and face mod in Textures\\Actors\\Character\\ -> all races
Textures\\Actors\\Character\\Character Assets\\tintmasks

eyes folder...

That should be able to give the vanilla npcs better appearance based on what mod you choose.

Installations:

Require -> ApachiiSkyHair v1.1 at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

+ the main download and optional here if you want to use

The archive should be compatible with nmm now thanks to -> Protocol_48

Or Manual Install by Extract using Winzip, 7zip program and paste the Data folder into your Skyrim folder.

Use NMM to arrange load orders

Skyrim.esm
Update.esm
ApachiiHair.esm
Unp53FIG.esm

Unp53FIGs.esp -> this esp must be put after mods that altered vanilla female npcs hair in order to get this to work.

To uninstall:

1. Create a clean save at home, or any interiors cells, uncheck my esm and esp.

2. Remove the Data folder files that come with this download.

Thanks To

Creation Kits & Tutorials
ApachiiSkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168

Permissions

If you want to use the hair please seek permission from ApachiiSkyHair author.
author: 8ltg

files.name: Housecarls without dragon shouts and goodies
